content: DBS Multiplier DBS Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Aug 2018Should I close my DBS Remix Savings account and link everything to my newly opened DBS Multiplier account?8 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (8)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Yes, DBS multiplier is much better. No minimum spend required too. Just make sure you have minimum 3k maintained in the multiplier account.1 comment2

Leong Wen Fong17 Sep 2018Yo Gab, someone said remix has no fall below fee for life, so he suggested transferring money out of it but keeping the account just in case there's a day you need it again.. What do you think?
JianHao SooLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 16 Sep 2018Yes, the interest rate in Multiplier is higher 0 comments1

Nicholas ChanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 16 Sep 2018No, remix account has no fall below fee for life. Do not close it! Just transfer everything to your multiplier account. U might 1 day use your remix account again. :) 0 comments1
Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2018Yes because of higher interest rates 0 comments1

Jeff Yeo,   amateur Social contributor  at School of social sharingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2018Yes close the older account and join the DBS muliplier camp ! ​Higher interest rates and better perks 0 comments1

Luke Ho, Kick-Ass Financial Services Consultant at Trillion Financial PlannersLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 31 Aug 2018Too many factors to consider here, but if you have a salary and you'd like higher interest with all other factors consistent, yes. 0 comments1

Kenichi Xi, nᴉʍ oʇ dǝnᴉʇsǝd 不能说的秘密 at Tag Team with Gabriel ThamLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Sep 2018Yes.  Close the DBS Remix Account.​Try to have as a few account as possible and focus on ur main account.​DBS Remix Account might not have  fall below fee for life but​1. $2 withdrawal fee if more than $4 ATM cash withdrawal in the month​2. Counter transaction $2 per cash withdrawal for amount within ATM cash withdrawal limit​3. highest interest rate is 0.1%​Just point number 3 is enough for you to move on and Pt 1 and 2 make life difficult for u when u need cash most.​IS better to be faithful to ONE then to have an affair.​Please upvote for me Only if you see Quality in my reply. Thank you.0 comments0

Jay Liu, Diploma in Accountancy  at KHEALevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2018If you're able to hit the bonus interest in DBS multiplier, yea close the remix account and shift your cash to multiplier for better interest rates. 0 comments0
